# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString; text_width::Int=80)
    lines = split(text, "\n")
    for (i, line) in enumerate(lines)
        if length(line) > text_width
            parts = split(line, r"(\s+)", keepempty=false)
            last_word = parts[end]
            for word in parts[1:end-1]
                if length(word) + length(last_word) <= text_width
                    append!(lines[i], " " * last_word)
                else
                    # 插入换行符，并调整末尾单词的前导空格
                    parts[end-1] = word * " "
                    lines[i+1] = """\n$last_word"""
                end
            end
        end
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# 示例

julia> wrap_string("Hello World! This is a very long sentence that should be wrapped. It's length exceeds the text width of 80 characters by quite a bit."; text_width=80)
"Hello World! This\nis a very long\nsentence that should\nbe wrapped. It's\nlength exceeds the\ntext width of 80\ncharacter by quite a\nbit."
```
